website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an ankle brace that promotes full ankle support, this product is a safe bet.
pros: Unlike some ankle braces that deliver support to a target area, this one provides even pressure across the ankle joint
The result is moderate pain relief from common ankle injuries such as sprains and plantar fasciitis
cons: A handful of consumers find that the band in the front can be a bit too tight, especially when this brace is worn with socks

customer_reviews.title: Both times followed sizing charts & was very satisfied with fit
customer_reviews.text: Second item bought from from this company. First item was for elbow. Both times followed sizing charts & was very satisfied with fit. Very happy with item arriving early. Very satisfied with with the relief I get. Not bulky, thought I would be bothered by layering, but it is very comfortable. When I know I am going to be doing a lot of walking like golf or a day of yard work it is on & at the end of the day I am not limping as usual. I had bought other copper products from other companies, but after trying the elbow brace, I knew I was going to get my ankle brace from Kunto Fitness too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, Awesome service.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I ordered and elbow compression brace for tennis elbow last year and felt good about it. I think it really helped. This year I have Tendonitis in my heel. I had no problem or hesitation ordering another Kunto compression brace from CRCCOM. I would like to add: I ordered the wrong size and had a problem with amazon while trying to return it. Colin at CRCCOM went out of his way and made everything right. He stayed with me all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice compression with mild stability assistance
customer_reviews.text: This ankle brace/sleeve is perfect if your looking for something to give you some compresssion and mild support. Id say it's a step above wearing a nice compression sock. It provides mild stability. I wear a men's size 10 wide shoe and the size small was perfect for the level of support I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bryant

customer_reviews.title: The first one I bought a medium size it slipped on my ankle like a sock
customer_reviews.text: This is not a compression sleeve for the ankle. I have ordered two different sizes now. The first one I bought a medium size it slipped on my ankle like a sock. I returned it and got a small and it still was to big on me I do not have small ankles I wear a 10.5. The small one went on like a sock as well and still wasnt feeling like it compressed my ankle just felt.like I had a sock on. There is no way that the extra small will feel like a compression sleeve on my ankle. Will be returning this here soon. Will not buy from this company at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Expensive spandex sock.
customer_reviews.text: It is just like wearing a spandex sock. The seller contacted me asking for feedback and never replied to my concerns. I bought another from a different brand, which works.
customer_reviews.author: Omar A. Gonzalez Hoz

customer_reviews.title: Can't Not Love This Workout Support Sock
customer_reviews.text: This is going to make me sound like a nerd right off, but I can't help but think wearing these to workouts and on the job makes me look like I come right out of the Tron world. I've had several compliments, and I always recommend this brand. Very comfortable, just make sure you get your foot measurements right. It's a support sock, not a regular comfy sock so you will want to make sure it's snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell E. Birzer

customer_reviews.title: super helpful.
customer_reviews.text: super helpful.. i have a weak ankle from an injury i sustained after a sport accident two years back.. i had a muscle tear which didn't get fixed yet.. it still aches sometimes when i stretch or when it is too cold.. this helps then also while playing too.. you can wash and the elastic doesn't get loose at all.. holds ankle the right amount and good grip.. looks good too..
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1857

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but a sock
customer_reviews.text: Cheap package. Disappointed when I received it. Nothing but expensive sox, doesn't have good support at all
customer_reviews.author: USA PACKING

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable ankle support I have found. I thought I sprained my ankle one summer about 15 years ago, but it turns out that I really broke it. This left me with a weak ankle and lots of arthritis. I also have varicose veins at the inner side of that foot. The compression is not severe, but it helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Strand

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the Kunto Ankle Brace.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many ankle braces and this one is, by far, my favorite. The construction "magically" compresses in all the right places. It almost feels like your not wearing anything while giving you the support you need. I am recovering from a recent sprain and I have a small tear in my tendon. When I use this brace my ankle does not swell, its amazing! The big plus is that it's also looks good, not just plan white or black.
customer_reviews.author: barga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and super nice seller at Kunto
customer_reviews.text: great product. Lightweight and just enough to keep my recovering sprain in check during the work day hidden under my sox. Timely and professional service. Love these guys at Kunto. Even though I had zero issues with the product or the service, they did a follow up contact, just in case, and invited me to reach out in the future if necessary. Who does that anymore?
customer_reviews.author: NJ Gal

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Useless and uncomfortable. I can actually feel the crease where it touches the foot and it made my feet kill. I had to take these off in the middle of a hike and felt immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Does cover good area.
customer_reviews.text: Should not be called a brace. Compression, yes. Brace, no. Does not provide much support but can help if having swelling or soreness in place of ace wrap. Does cover good area.
customer_reviews.author: BWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for the past few days (i have arthritis in both ankles) and I drive on average 4 to 5 hours a day, usually resulting in aching swollen ankles. These compression supports have certainly helped in minimising this. Very pleased with them and they are very comfortable, they stay in place with no "rolling or bunching up". Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Peter Piper

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle brace for a change it fits the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Good ankle brace for a change it fits the size and is not too tight by cutting blood flow on the leg. I did a 4 miles run with it slow pace to test my stability with the brace and the shoe and got used to it after 2 miles or so, recovering from injuries. After the run the ankle was not swollen as it usually does, currently wearing it everyday and bought a 2nd for backup - I suggest cold wash no heat.
customer_reviews.author: StopThink

customer_reviews.title: Item run true to the size.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a small and medium base on comments. The item is true to the size. The medium was to big. Dissapointed had problems printing the return label. Stuck with a product i dont have used for. Send a communication message to vendor with no respond. Be careful when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeraldas12

customer_reviews.title: This is as great product -very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is as great product -very comfortable, easy to put on & take off. These were so great I wanted to wear them all the time. My therapist advised I should not wear them unless exercising or in treatment. A great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: zeusarrow

customer_reviews.title: More compression from a sock
customer_reviews.text: I get more compression from a regular sock. I think you need bigger legs for this to work, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter for her marathon run ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her marathon run. She broke her ankle a few years ago and wanted something for her longer runs. She has told me this helped a lot. It's not too loose or too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great Ankle Brace
customer_reviews.text: Severely sprained my ankle leaving it very weak. Love this ankle brace as it supports my ankle making it easier and less painful to walk. I am going to continue to were the brace even after the ankle heals completely . The added support may help keep it from becoming sprained again. Highly recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: It's not too tight but gives good support, and is easy to toss in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ankle surgery a little under a year ago, and on rainy days I am still so sore. I wear this brace and it really helps with the pain and keeping the swelling down. It's not too tight but gives good support, and is easy to toss in the wash. Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Litts

customer_reviews.title: Good for sleeping in, not enough support for daytime use if you stand on your feet a lot
customer_reviews.text: This was good for wearing at night but does not offer enough support for daytime use. I bought this as I was recovering from a pretty severe fracture of my foot. I had to go with thicker support for standing on foot but this one felt good just for night time use.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C.

customer_reviews.title: At first, brace fit perfectly and gave some support ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, brace fit perfectly and gave some support, but not a lot. Now, after wearing it, it has stretched out around the ankle and there isn't any support or compression. Unfortunately, for me, it is now past the return window and I am out the money, and have a worthless ankle brace. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but could use more compression
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but even going to a small didn't offer quite the amount of compression I would have liked. I wear a size 10 shoe and the small worked just OK. It's a very well-made sock, just offered minimal compression for my skinny ankles.
customer_reviews.author: S Frack

customer_reviews.title: Way to big!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them according to size chart and they are huge, so they don't work!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was ok.... It wasn't the kind of support I was looking for regarding volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be a great to help my ankle while I ran
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great to help my ankle while I ran, but it either cuts of circulation or hurts my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Relief for ankle swelling
customer_reviews.text: My mom had swelling and pain around her ankle for weeks. She asked me to buy this for her. It arrived on time and she felt relief after wearing it for half a day. She has kept using it as needed. She was able to travel on a long plane trip with this recently.
customer_reviews.author: smartcookie

customer_reviews.title: I then ordered an extra small and it gives me better support since my ankles are small
customer_reviews.text: The ankle brace is giving my ankle support for tendonitis without the bulk of wrapping. I wear a size 7-1/2 to 8 shoe and started with the small. I then ordered an extra small and it gives me better support since my ankles are small.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: It wooks
customer_reviews.text: Needed extra support for an injured ankle while still playing volleyball in the sand. It helps but it's not a brace, I use it in conjunction with an ankle wrap.
customer_reviews.author: D V

customer_reviews.title: Support for achilles
customer_reviews.text: I have an achilles problem and this seems to help during aerobics class. We do a lot of lateral movements as well and this product helps support my foot.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: It helped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after I injured my ankle playing soccer. It did help lesson the pain and keeping my ankle from shifting.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: well constructed but no size chart, i'm a size ...
customer_reviews.text: well constructed but no size chart, i'm a size 8 got medium, too big. Got small too big. Get xs if your in the 8 mens range
customer_reviews.author: Scott V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it.... This fits so good and the support is great. So much better than wearing the lace up ankle support the doctors give you, especially when you need support for your ankle all of the time....
customer_reviews.author: Gayle M. Gerst

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: This product has given my healing ankle non-obtrusive Support and is very comfortable. I hardly remember I have it on, but gives my ankle great support
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe Ragouzeos

customer_reviews.title: underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: Size 8 women shoe, so I got the small. Doesn't provide any compression though.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy String

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Good, comfortable support. Bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lama

customer_reviews.title: Not the best support
customer_reviews.text: Much less support than I thought it would have. Sizing chart works well. A lot thinner than I would have liked. More like an ankle warmer that support.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very good brace, thoroughly tested.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brace. I bought this product a few months ago and it works very well and holds up. I am a forester and spend long hours in the woods on steep and uneven terrain. Almost immediately my ankle swelling decreased and I have fewer problems with ankle instability at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best ankle brace I own
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best ankle brace I own. Very comfortable and gives me the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Tinalee

customer_reviews.title: The black design hides the grossness considering how often I've worn this
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable, "pretty," non-bulky compression sock I've tried, but could be a little tighter - wish there was an XS. Maybe they are sized for men.
customer_reviews.author: papertigers28

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a bad foot and ankle brake needing surgery. I was not able to walk without pain. When I received this I have to admit I never thought it would work. But it does. It gives me the support I need to walk without pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: odd because it is hard to notice it working while it is on because it feels just like a sock
customer_reviews.text: Work, odd because it is hard to notice it working while it is on because it feels just like a sock, but I can always tell when I go with out it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great for Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Can't say much more than this is a 2nd one! Works great for arthritis in my wife's foot! Nice fit, good tension but not too much to cause discomfort. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for sprain recovery
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my recovery from a bad ankle sprain. I wear this most of the day and it's comfortable but still keeps the appropriate amount of compression to keep the swelling down and keep my ankle feeling stable. I anticipate I'll continue wearing it as I start ramping my activities back up until my ankle is back to full strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for recovery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife a bit after her injurying a ligament in her left ankle. With the boot brace and sports tape not doing much for comfort, this was my next idea. No regrets, the day didn't even reach the 2nd hour and she was showing almost immediate comfort and mobility. Not a fix all, but definitely a useful tool in recovery. I'll be hanging on to this bad boy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vagasky

customer_reviews.title: get a size up, very tight if you get ...
customer_reviews.text: get a size up, very tight if you get your own size, especially if you have an injury and its swollen.
customer_reviews.author: Savita Crump

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its not a cure all but helps support my ankle have 2 one fro each ankle
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have weak ankles and these sleeves have helped so much keep my ankles stable when I exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to their sizing chart, very happy with it, not too tight and no seams that dig into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gofron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great support!!! Really helps by keeping the swelling down. Feels great after walking on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ankle is really sore and the brace is hard to get on without hurting your ankle more.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find the item
customer_reviews.text: Solid listing. Easy to find the item, understand it's purpose and obtain additional information from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief for Achilles tendon
customer_reviews.text: My son has had pain in his Achilles tendon while running, but doctors can't find anything causing the pain. This ankle brace greatly helps with relief. I like that it supports the heel instead of having the usual cut out area for the heel.
customer_reviews.author: beverly tinkler

customer_reviews.title: The ankle sleeve Is Comfortable, flexible
customer_reviews.text: The ankle sleeve Is Comfortable, flexible, and breathable. I use it for running and it supports my ankle and prevents any further ankle rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Flores

customer_reviews.title: Too large - no compression
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I severely sprained my ankle and needed a little support/compression for swelling once I was out of the boot - unfortunately this felt like I was just wearing a sock. I ordered the small (I'm a women's size 7 with a low profile foot) and it's too large and there isn't a smaller option. It may work for someone else but it definitely didn't do anything for me :(
customer_reviews.author: KatieOz

customer_reviews.title: Nice support I ordered a second one and decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I sprained my ankle and bought one of these for laying around without my boot. Nice support I ordered a second one and decided to order their knee brace too!
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: The ankle brace has more than met my expectations I ...
customer_reviews.text: The ankle brace has more than met my expectations I have a sciatic nerve problem and it has helped relieve the foot pain
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in a size small for a size 9 shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robbins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my ankle and it really helped in supporting it. Very good support brace. Try it. You won't be disappointed. Easy to put on to.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pattenb

customer_reviews.title: I was shocked how well this worked! I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked how well this worked! I thought there was no way this piece of fabric could offer enough support for my sprained ankle. I was totally wrong. The minute I put it on there was instant support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his. It provides support "without cutting off blood supply" to quote him.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M.

customer_reviews.title: Kunto Fitness Ankle Brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace is just what I needed! It fits well and really helps when I'm out running around at my Volleyball games. Really happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mcq.09

customer_reviews.title: It fits like a dream Feels like a cloud is wrapped lovingly ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits like a dream Feels like a cloud is wrapped lovingly around my ankle. The sizing is right on. Best support I have ever bought!!
customer_reviews.author: martin pilarski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product keeps swelling down and nice and positive people working for the business.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Made my ankle feel instantly better!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible ankles due to MANY sprains over the years. After pulling this thing on to my worst ankle I instantly wanted to get one of these for every joint on my body. Can they make a full body suit?! :-P
customer_reviews.author: ProgrammedForDamage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that gives just the right amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: brian pedrazzani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. If you're looking for something that is super tight or restricting this is not that. But if you are looking for a product with support that helps your joint feel a little more secure this is perfect. It works great for me and feels great. It doesn't cut off the circulation to my foot like some supports that I've had! And it is nice and slim and fits great inside of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Compression for me
customer_reviews.text: I may need a smaller size, but I ordered the smallest they make and it did not provide any compression for me. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ankle brace provides good comfort, support with compression. I would recommend to anyone with injury to their ankle, protecting while in the healing process, and for daily use to help prevent future injuries.
customer_reviews.author: bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: but I feel better when I wear it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it does much, but I feel better when I wear it. I sprained my ankle a while ago and I think it kind of helps with swelling...
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: Nice ankle brace, sprained my ankle while playing soccer but this helps with my recovery
customer_reviews.author: Andres Chavez

customer_reviews.title: A Helpful Brace
customer_reviews.text: Adds just the right amount of support when recovering from foot or ankle injuries
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Compression sock, not brace.
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this as a brace. This nothing but a compression sock.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: An ankle brace that actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Arthur-Ritus daily assaults my left ankle. It swells and hurts 24/7. I was browsing through Amazon and saw this ankle brace. I have tried other braces and some were bulky and I could not get my shoe to fit. I ordered this brace and put it on. I can wear it all day and it gives me relief. I love it. I will order another soon as a back up. The quality is outstanding and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gray Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ankle sleeve to help with recovery after a severe sprain. The sleeve allows for good motion while aiding in stability and the compression level is just right for the residual pain from torn tendons on the mend. sizing at first fit felt like maybe a little tighter might be better but after wearing all day at work it just right. I am a men's size 9.5 and a small fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Twisted Ankle Sleeve Saver
customer_reviews.text: So helpful for post-injury swelling. I was trying to wrap my ankle in a standard ace bandage to apply compression after I had twisted my ankle. Not working and way bulky. This sleeve was awesome to decrease swelling (on my feet all day as a veterinarian, no rest for the weary!) and was slim and easy to wear with sneakers or danskos at work. This sleeve won't prevent instability, but will help if you're struggling with edema!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but get a size smaller than indicated.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and delivered promptly. It seems to have helped stop the recurring swelling I've had for the past three months, as well as minimize (but not eliminate) pain. According the sizing chart, I should've gotten a size medium, but went with the size small, and I'm glad I did. Even with the smaller size, I wish it had a little more tension, but it's pretty good overall. I'd say it's a good, cheap option you can try before turning to other, more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Braedon Roney

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really like this ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this ankle brace. It provides the extra support I need and I like the aesthetics as well. My only complaint about it is that where the bottom of the sleeve hits my foot seems to be right at a pressure point or something in my food, so if I wear it for an extended period of time or while doing strenuous activity it causes pain in the middle of my foot. So helps with the ankle but can cause pain lower in the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lessened ankle pain and prevented my ankle from collapsing any more
customer_reviews.text: I've developed serious ankle pain over the last few months, to the point that my ankle will collapse. I also don't own a car, so I need to be able to walk long distances to get to work, etc. I ordered this to use until I could get to the orthopedist. It has worked wonderfully. The pain has lessened, and it has kept my ankle from collapsing. Once I get the issue figured out with my doctor, I plan to keep the sleeve in our first aid kit for other minor injuries. In any case, I am in less pain now than I have been in months.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Not a brace, just a thick sock
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this is even called a brace. It is a bit thicker than a sock and provides zero support. If your ankle is unstable, this isn't the brace for you and is way too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not much support
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and very comfortable but if you are looking for support suggest you look elsewhere or at least go for a smaller size. I was on the cusp (size 9.5) and opted for a Small rather than X-Small, which was a mistake. Cost to return is a third of the price I paid to buy it, which was a surprise, but for me it is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Anglosin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had four surgeries on my left ankle I own a lot of braces.... This one is great for light support/compression not bulky, material is comfortable. I was concerned the small wouldn't fit because my ankle tends to swell quite a bit but the small was a good fit for my shoe size. Update: after several years of use and being my go to brace it’s finally started to wear out... and I bought myself the newer version. Couldn’t be happier this thing is worth it’s weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility AND support
customer_reviews.text: This brace is comfortable but it also provides support with flexibility. Some braces are too stiff or too tight even when ordering the correct size. I purchased this because I twisted my ankle and don't have the luxury of taking a couple days off to ice and elevate. I walk a lot to and from work so this provided much needed support and peace of mind. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyJaxs

customer_reviews.title: Helps to reduce ankle sprain a lot
customer_reviews.text: I sprained my ankle a lot (don't know why) and this helps me to reduce the frequency of getting injuries. It can be tight as it tries to keep your ankle in place. One of the favorite product for work out.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Do

customer_reviews.title: Great after an injury
customer_reviews.text: After a severe ankle sprain walking has been very difficult. I feel comfortable and confident with this on, it really stabilizes me. My one complaint and the reason I knocked a star off is that the toe opening elastic is just too tight. I broke the elastic under the fabric with a needle and that helps but wearing it all day at work starts cutting off the circulation in my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle brace!
customer_reviews.text: After a severe ankle sprain this brace has been a lifesaver! It gives me just enough support to steady my ankle, while allowing me to bear some weight on it while I'm healing. It doesn't squeeze too tight, and is comfortable to wear all day! Of all the braces I've tried, even the ones from the doctors office, this one has been my favorite by far!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin J. Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: With exercise and the boots I can walk great. Thank you for sending this and for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One for each ankle. I fractured one ankle and walked out of the ortho with no support. I decided to buy my own. I looked at this twice. One gentleman said gives support...yet is light. I found this to be true. When I wear tall boots I seem to have more support than sneakers. With exercise and the boots I can walk great. Thank you for sending this and for the gentleman whose description fit me. Ellie
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfy but I should've bought a size smaller. Based on reviews I went with a medium but it turned out to be slightly too big to do enough compressing to warrant me wearing it all the time. I wear a size 12 in women's.... so that should tell you something about the sizing. For the short time I did wear it, it felt comfy and not like it would get in the way of me walking.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCow

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have constantly looking for the right ankle brace support. I ordered Small. I got chicken legs. And I have ankle osteo arthritis. Ankle is sort of misaligned. Great color combination and texture. Not what I was expecting. I was looking for something that would be a little bit tighter with side supports for the ankles. Even for the Small size, it was still a tad bit lose. Might as well include this to the stack of braces that I have purchased and continue looking for the right one to come along......Nothing against the seller. Just the wrong product for me.....
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Cuatico

customer_reviews.title: confidence inspiring
customer_reviews.text: confidence inspiring. not a brace, just a sleeve, so if your ankle is really dodgy you might need something else. but excluding that, this is an excellent precaution. helps ensure stability and reduce risk of rolling/twisting your ankle. i play soccer, and always make certain to have this, i literally don'r play without it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compression healing from foot and ankle injury
customer_reviews.text: It does had bulk and gives moderate compression. I love it. I don't know about stability but the compression is just perfect. If you need more, then a Zenzah foot sleeve would be appropriate but this one offers good compression without having to struggle peeling it off. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: jennvice

customer_reviews.title: Some Support for Ankle - order smaller size
customer_reviews.text: This provides some support for a healthy ankle. I wear size 11 in men's and the medium was too large. Small was the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Scripts

customer_reviews.title: Give your ankle a "little hug!"
customer_reviews.text: Expensive . . . yes! Worth it . . . yes! My wife wears the ankle brace every day. It provides adequate support without restricting blood circulation to her foot. The brace is very well constructed. I've used the cheaper brands over the years. They are poorly constructed, uncomfortable, plus they provide inadequate support! My wife says Kunto ankle braces give her ankle "a little hug!" Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Great after my ankle injury
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what else to say! It's amazing how much this thing supported my ankle as it was in the final stages of healing! It's been great for outdoor activities, sports, everything! Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Seanessy

customer_reviews.title: This is a comfortable ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable ankle brace. My ankle has been irritated for months and I find this helpful to use while I sleep. My ankle is on the small side so I would not recommend sleeping with it if your foot is larger. I ordered another one to use while driving long distances. It is a bit more expensive than some of the others I looked at, but for me it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Rolled my ankle pretty good and this thing came in very handy
customer_reviews.text: Rolled my ankle pretty good and this thing came in very handy. It was nice and tight and gave my ankle that extra support and fit within my work boots and shoes
customer_reviews.author: isaac brandt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I broke my ankle in a car accident 3 months ago. Now that I'm off the boot I was looking for a good ankle brace I had two others, one didn't help much, the other too bulky this one is just perfect. It feels just like a sock and it really helps my ankle. I feel less pain and I'm able to walk for longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Discovered.......Product believable.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe tendonitis in my ankles and this ankle sleeve has permitted me to function at a level way above previous years. Ankle pain is kept at a minumum and I am walking farther and better all the time.
customer_reviews.author: lynda heatherington

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased after spraining my ankle, to help me transition back into normal walking without a splint. Not very helpful for my purposes--as a stabilizer. Ok for compression. Not thrilled about paying $20 for basically one tight toeless sock however.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

product_meta.title: Kunto Fitness Ankle Brace Compression Support Sleeve for Injury Recovery, Joint Pain, Swelling, Plantar Fasciitis & Achilles Tendon - Superior Arch Support Foot Socks for Any Activity!
feature_bullets: SUPPORT YOU CAN FEEL - Kunto Fitness’ Ankle Brace applies even pressure across your ankle joint, which provides moderate relief from a multitude of ailments such as plantar fasciitis, arthritis, sprains, swelling, muscle fatigue, and other common ankle pain. Let Kunto Fitness give you the support you need to keep on going and taking on the day!

EVERYWHERE YOU WANT TO BE - No matter if you’re a hiker, runner, or just enjoy a nice long walk, our ankle sleeves will keep the pain at bay, and make your favorite activities that much easier! From breathable comfort to a fit that can’t be beat, we’ve got the support you need.

A BETTER WEAVE - We use a blend of fabrics to get the best all of them have to offer! Our unique sleeve offers comfort and mobility, as well as the all-important breathability. Kunto Fitness’ sleeves are form fitting without the itchiness or stiffness other sleeves can leave you with. Enjoy top tier flexibility with the arch support you need to keep the pain at bay and you on your way.

THE PERFECT FIT - It doesn’t matter if you’re beefy, lean, or somewhere in-between, we have a sleeve for you! Comfort is the name of the game here, and we’ve got it under control; not tight enough to put your foot to sleep, but strong enough to stay in place and offer support where and when you need it most. Our sizes are exact, and our specialized blend of fabrics make our brace a breeze to put on and take off.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We’re dedicated to offering superior service. If you aren’t completely satisfied simply contact Kunto Fitness and tell us what went wrong. If we can’t fix the problem, we’ll be more than happy to replace your product, or give you 100% of the money you spend with us. We are THAT CONFIDENT in our ankle sleeve. With a guarantee like that, why look anywhere else?
